CustomField.description: champ technique utilisé pour la génération automatique des factures
CustomField.formula: '&Id=' & Id & '&QueryId=[LineItems]' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQInvoice_Lines_LineItems__c & ',[CompanyDets]' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQAccount_Details_CompanyDets__c & ',[LigneBerceau]' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQLigne_Berceau_LigneBerceau__c & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Tech_DateAttestationCAF__c)), ',[AttestationCAF]' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQAttestation_CAF__c & '?pv0=' & blng__Account__c & '~pv1=' & TEXT(Tech_DateAttestationCAF__c), '' ) & ',[CreditNotes]' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQCredit_Notes__c & ',[DebitNotes]' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQDebit_Notes__c & ',[ParticipationCAF]'& $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CIQParticipation_CAF__c & '&TemplateId=' & IF( blng__Account__r.RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Famille', IF( AND( TEXT(blng__Account__r.LPCR_MoyenPaiement__c) = 'Virement', NOT(ISBLANK(blng__Account__r.LPCR_RIB__c)) ), $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CITFacture_B2C_paiement_prelevement__c, $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CITFacture_B2C_paiement_CB__c ) & IF( NOT(ISBLANK(Tech_DateAttestationCAF__c)), ',' & $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CITAttestation_CAF__c, '' ), $Setup.LPCR_IDsCongaAdobe__c.LPCR_CITFacture_B2B__c ) & '&UF0=1&MFTS0=LPCR_StatutFacture__c&MFTSValue0=Envoyée&SC0=1&SC1=Attachments'
CustomField.label: Tech_Formule Conga Batch
